body.p: This feature indicates the number of queues that the host requests for this controller. This feature will only be issued during initialization prior to creation of any I/O Submission and/or Completion Queues. The value allocated will not change between resets.

fig.title: Number of Queues Command Control Flow

table.title: Number of Queues Command Control Flow

entry.p: The command is received by one of the Data Managers.
The Data Manager forwards the command to the Admin Command Manager for processing.

The Admin Command Manager sends a completion queue update request to the Completion Manager. DWord 0 of the completion contains 0x007F007F reporting that the controller supports 128 I/O submission and completion queues.
The Completion Manager replies back to the Admin Command Manager when the completion has been successfully sent to the host.
